AbundantPreparation.Description: Adds a mythic ability that grants 4 additional preparation slots for arcanists for 1st, 2nd, and 3rd levels.

AbundantPreparationGreater.Description: Adds a mythic ability that grants 4 additional preparation slots for arcanists for 7th, 8th, and 9th levels.

AbundantPreparationImproved.Description: Adds a mythic ability that grants 4 additional preparation slots for arcanists for 4th, 5th, and 6th levels.

PaladinSpellSecret.Description: Adds paladin to the selection of loremaster spell secrets.
